page.title: 15TRANSPORT SURVEY IN OTTERTON
page.content:
To give an idea of the rate of {traffic flow}in the summer months, we made a survey of the different kinds of vehicles going in each direction in the main street. We did this for 1hr. mid-morning and 1 hr. mid-afternoon. These are the results:
|TOWARDS MILL | TOWARDS SEA ______________________________________ | A.M. P.M | A.M. P.M. ______________________________________ CARS | 156 94 | 96 97 LORRIES | 2 5 | 5 5 TRACTORS | 0 0 | 0 0 BUSES | 1 1 | 1 1 VANS | 12 10 | 5 10 M.CYLES | 4 4 | 5 6 BICYCLES | 1 2 | 6 1 ______________________________________ In the winter months, there will be fewer holidaymakers and fewer cars.
